column1: #text=With a yawn I realized why I was so tired .
#text=and it was a very long flight .
#text=I had purchased my ticket online , so I only had to check-in when I arrived at the airport .
#text=The took my bag at that time , and I walked over to the security gate .
#text=I was really happy I had remembered to wear slip on , sensible shoes , and easy fit clothing .
#text=I placed my purse and shoes in the bucket to go through the scanner , and stepped through a scanner of my own .
#text=Sometimes that is all it takes , but I was tapped on the shoulder , and pulled aside for a random search .
#text=This didnt upset me though , it happens , although with more frequency than I would like .
#text=A few moments of pat down , and I was putting my shoes back on .
#text=Taking my purse I headed for the gate listed on my boarding pass .
#text=Near the gate was a small shop .
#text=I decided to buy a bottle of water , and a magazine to read on the plane .
#text=I heard an announcement that my plane was beginning to board , so I paid quickly , and joined the line at the gate .
#text=They checked my boarding pass as I reached the head of the line , and now I was headed down a small hallway to the plane .
#text=I could hear the whine of engines as I went through the entry door .
#text=The airline personnel smiled and greeted me , checked my boarding pass , and gave me a general idea of where to find my seat .
#text=It wasnt long before they closed the door , and they were giving safety instructions .
#text=I listened closely , reading along on the safety card , and smiled remembering my first airline flight .
#text=I had been 3 , and could not read yet .
#text=I leaned my head back , as the plane taxi 'd , then sped down the runway for takeoff .
